quality.comment: Everything was cooked well and the staff was very friendly. The only down side was the group smoke fest by the staff right at closing as I left.

Horrible! Got seated right away and wanted to order but of course the waitress wasn't ready. So we had to wait on her. Then our salads came out in good time and our food followed shortly behind but when I cut into my stake it was over cooked it had no pick center like I had asked for it (medium well) slightly pick.
